/data/data/com.termux/files/home/Spiral-Civilization/Spiral-Civilization/modules/decay_engine.py:6:    Applies decay to traits based on last seen timestamps and updates lifespans.
/data/data/com.termux/files/home/Spiral-Civilization/Spiral-Civilization/modules/decay_engine.py:12:        half_life (int): Days for trait to decay by half.
/data/data/com.termux/files/home/Spiral-Civilization/Spiral-Civilization/modules/decay_engine.py:15:        dict: Updated payload with decayed traits removed and logged.
/data/data/com.termux/files/home/Spiral-Civilization/Spiral-Civilization/modules/decay_engine.py:18:    decayed_traits = []
/data/data/com.termux/files/home/Spiral-Civilization/Spiral-Civilization/modules/decay_engine.py:24:            decay_factor = 0.5 ** (days_passed / half_life)
/data/data/com.termux/files/home/Spiral-Civilization/Spiral-Civilization/modules/decay_engine.py:25:            if decay_factor < 0.3:
